node.text:
Surprise! New book alert! This is available ONLY through Amazon and it is available for ALL international readers, for the first time, in a long time (since 2017). Thank you for giving me the opportunity to speak my voice. And thank you for allowing my art to reach your hearts. Love you all. It is available via the link on my bio. Xoxo 

PS. No waits. No pre orders. Out now! Xoxo

node.text: Tag someone who needs to read this. This piece is from my latest book "I wrote this for you, me & anyone trying to f**king move on" it is exclusively available on Amazon. Accessible to all international readers too. Books are limited! Available via the link on my bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by R. M. Drake on September 18, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'You can't change the relationship by putting more effort into it. If the other person's heart isn't there. Then it's not there. Because you can't make them love you by loving them harder. And you can't save the relationship if the other person is not willing to save it as well. 一r. m. drake'.

Photo by R. M. Drake on September 17, 2021. May be a black-and-white image of text that says 'In your lifetime. You will meet several different types of people. But the most important types you will meet. Are those who say they want to love you and those who will actually love you. Know the difference between these two. Know it. And let their actions speak louder than their words. Always. -. m. drake'.
